code: export var DateStringFormatter=function DateStringFormatter(str){var locale=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:false;var d=new Date(str);if(locale){return d.toLocaleDateString("cs-CZ",{year:"numeric",month:"long",day:"numeric"});}var year=d.getFullYear();var month=""+(d.getMonth()+1);var day=""+d.getDate();return[year,month.length<2?"0"+month:month,day.length<2?"0"+day:day].join("-");};export default DateStringFormatter;
